DOC.brief_summary: Closure of Patent Foramen Ovale with the AMPLATZERÂ® PFO OCCLUDER in patients with at least two cryptogenic strokes due to presumed paradoxical embolism through a patent foramen ovale and who have failed conventional therapy.
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective of the PFO Access Registry is to allow access to the AMPLATZER PFO Occluder in subjects with a PFO who have already experienced at least two cryptogenic strokes due to presumed paradoxical embolism through a patent foramen ovale and who have failed conventional drug therapy.
DOC.criteria: Patent foramen ovale(PFO) recurrent stroke failed antiplatelet/anticoagulant therapy International normalized ration (INR) outside of 23 intracardiac thrombus (subjects may be enrolled after resolution of thrombus)
